name: Outlook y!Glass
description:
UNDER CONSTRUCTION - PREVIEW
Made to mimic the glass yahoo mail experience with a linux display feel.
Extended to address book and skydrive.
Includes adblock.
additional_info:
v1.1 - Readability fix.

v1.0 - Launch
     Right click and hover menu text is dark - working on fix.
     Selection effect is stark - working on opacity fix.
Everything else themed to provide a smooth glass feel.
Includes adblock

Planned updates: further extending theme to cover additional address book and skydrive elements.

This is a remix/mod of the stunning Darker Outlook.com theme.
https://userstyles.org/styles/70654/darker-outlook-com
